name: Potato Patch Propaganda
description:
Made for GMC Jam 18 where the theme was "Cold War", the handicap was "Sound Effects must be made using your own mouth" and the secret word was "Tree".

General Tatorov is the army chief of the United Socialist Spuds Regime. He must maintain absolute control over his army of communist potatoes.

But Potus McSpud of the United Spuds Association has other ideas - he wants to tempt the potatoes of the USSR towards capitalism by offering them cars, money and fine women.

Ensure loyalty in the ranks by slapping capitalist potatoes with your leek before the time limit runs out.
